we want to help make the world a better place.
世の中をもっといいところにしたいから
lenders.occupational_info: We were several groups all working toward the common goal of translating Kiva into Japanese when Matt, Kiva's founder, came to Japan in November 2008. He was like a magnet, drawing us all together, and we have been working as one group since then. Our version of the translated site is online...please check out the link below....いくつかのグループでKiva を日本語に訳す共通のゴールに向かって動いていた時、Kivaの創設者 Mattが昨年の１１月に来日しました。彼は磁石のように私たちを引き寄せて、それ例来一つになって行動ています。翻訳されたサイトがアップされます．．．．．下記のリンクをアクセスしてください。

lenders.name: RAKADRI GHANA LTD
lenders.loan_because:
Dear respected one ,

I am the owner of  Rakadri GHANA LTD ,A  member of the National Association of Sheanut Farmers Processors and Buyers of Ghana with a wide range of services in the CENTRAL ABABOU SUPPER MARKET OF TAMALE GHANA.
We are looking for a loan or an investor for an amount of US$ 200,000.00 for business and if this investment proposal succeeds will establish a small unit  that will be in charge of MICRO FINANCE and RURAL ENTERPRISE PROJECT DEVELOPMENT FINANCING .Our local women are looking for support to help them in their shea butter procesings , trade and others.
Thank you

Ahmed rayan kadiri

MD of RAKADRI GHANA LTD
TEL: 00233 243 646 155
lenders.occupational_info: Member of the association of Shea nut farmers  Processors and buyers of Ghana . I am a business man and one who helps in way to improve upon the life style of my people,especially the local market women.

lenders.name: Grundoon
lenders.loan_because: I believe KIVA can leverage my humble efforts to create a big improvement in people's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I help test global positioning system features of mobile phone software.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lenders.loan_because: people around the world deserve and opportunity.

lenders.name: Arnaud
lenders.loan_because: share  is divine

lenders.name: Hamish
lenders.loan_because: Why not? You (probably) can't lose money but you can help.

lenders.name: Patti Pokorchak
lenders.loan_because:
I"ve been self-employed since 1992 and I feel that is the way to have greater control over your life. You determine what you will earn and how you will earn it. It is a lot of responsibility but also brings with it a lot of freedom and sense of pride.

I"ve traveled to several under-developed countries and realize how 'rich' we are here in N. America compared to others and want to share some of that richness to make others lives easier. I like to encourage those who look after themselves rather than waiting for social assistance.
lenders.occupational_info: I help small businesses become more profitable with my practical advice! I"ve worked in a number of different countries, industries and businesses, so have  a wide knowledge base to draw from.

lenders.name: Lexi
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a Social Security Law firm for disabled clients. I read their medical records and write summaries to judges before their hearings.

lenders.name: Rebekah Jane
lenders.loan_because: I want to help provide women an opportunity to realize their hopes for better and more secure lives.

lenders.name: Oliver
lenders.loan_because:
need additional capital for buying various models of
celfones at wholesale price.
lenders.occupational_info: i am enjoying my business with big earning, what sad only is i can not expand my business as well as my income due to insufficient capital. If possible, i want to loan at least not lower than $2,000 in order for me to get different models of celfones at wholeale price. As of now, my celfone stock averages 6 units a day only. There were days, my wife and my staffs sell 6 units or more in just one day, forcing us to buy again in the city the following day. in that 6 units of celfone, i even need to divide it so that my other shop can also display celfone thus leaving only 3 celfone in my display rack. Profit in celfone bussiness is guaranteed here in my country Philippines because Philippines is number 1 text capital in the world.

lenders.name: Jim

lenders.name: Rudy
lenders.loan_because: "It is a great mistake to do nothing because you think you can do only a little."  - I find this warning to be inspiring and it reflects my view of Kiva.  This is a great example of empowering people to reach out and support one another toward pursuing positive goals.  Thank you Kiva, for an opportunity to care for my fellow man/woman.
lenders.occupational_info: I normally write computer programs used in electronic devices or machine control systems.

lenders.occupational_info: Business Management

project management tools, project scheduling, web project management, software development management, web based crm, risk management software, project management program, managing projects, task management software, vision engineering, software design website design 2.0, social network engineering, trend spotting, to name a few.

lenders.loan_because: Because the wealth of our world is distributed unevenly. Because of Gospel passage: "Whoever does this for the least of these, does it for me also."

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I have been lucky in life and am grateful.  I loan because I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a group of people who prepare papwerwork for loans to businesses of all sizes.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I care!  I would like to have the courage to start my own business; in the meantime, I would like to help others who have taken that leap.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in marketing for a small software company based in Philadelphia.  I develop campaigns that our customers can use within their organizations to drive usage of the software.  I also build initiatives to encourage clients to buy more from us.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: credit (and savings!) used with conscious awareness creates growth and development for one's self and one's community.
lenders.occupational_info: I educate and advise people, whether they have lots of money or very little, about the rules of money so they can take care of themselves, their families and their communities.  My focus is on lending people money to purchase a home in the U.S.  There are many financial advantages to home ownership in the U.S.  And owning one's home is a powerful experience that empowers people to build their lives and the lives of those around them.  But, it starts with a commitment to financial education whether you ever own a home or not.

lenders.name: Dorothy
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to be able to do this; how can I not?

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: Somebody loaned to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I make complicated work simple and help big groups of strangers work together.

We are wine brokers / we sell the wine for wineries

lenders.occupational_info: As of right now im a student at Northeastern University in Boston.  Upon graduation I plan on working for a global consulting firm, helping in the unification of the world

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I want to help entrepreneurs lift themselves out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked at the patent office for 3 years (lots of mindless paperwork for the government arguing with lawyers and Japanese tech corporations).  I am currently wandering around the world.

lenders.name: Emma
lenders.loan_because: I can help so many people.
lenders.occupational_info: I read for hours on end.  Favourite books include The Underland Chronicles, Alex Rider, The Inheritance Cycle, Warriors, and Harry Potter.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Dutchy
lenders.loan_because: Everybody should have the same opportunity to improve their lifestyle,regardless of their geographical location or culture.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired, and live not a rich life,but comfortable, and if I can share some of the spoils from my life's work to make someone else's life more comfortable, than I have not wasted my life.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I want to help out others in some way.  I don't have much but this is an opportunity for me to do something to help others in the world.

lenders.name: matteo
lenders.loan_because: i can

lenders.name: Franklyn
lenders.loan_because: I don't have much money, but I have enough to loan someone $25!

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: Lending a hand is so much more effective than giving a hand-out. Besides, it's just fun to invest in a small business, then watch it grow!

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I want to improve the lives of people who are less fortunate than I am.

lenders.name: Ruston
lenders.loan_because: Keeps me in check
lenders.occupational_info: ...computers go boom, i bring a wrench.

lenders.name: Money to Get Home Jar
lenders.loan_because: It's what I do best.
lenders.occupational_info: I started as a change receptacle in the lovely Freshman residence of Matt Gelfand and Jake Johnson, and eventually discovered my life's mission: turning people's spare change into contributions to worthy causes.

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: The best way to form a stable government is to have prosperous citizens.
lenders.occupational_info: I respond to all types of emergencies, from fires to medical incidents, and from natural disasters to man-made crises.

lenders.name: Brett
lenders.loan_because: It takes power away from 'The Man' and puts it in the hands of sensible people who believe in a better future for our world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to protect children from abuse and neglect.

lenders.name: Marguerite
lenders.loan_because: like many of these people, I too needed a helping hand many times in my life. If I can help at least one person succeed in taking care of themselves and others I am grateful!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a multi passionate Entreprenuer who's primary passion is helping people accomplish the dream of homeownership!

lenders.name: Anthea
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others create a better life for themselves, their family and their community.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a small business looking after peoples gardens in Victoria BC Canada.

lenders.name: Shawn & Olya
lenders.loan_because: I have traveled to other countries and met many wonderful people who are hard working and very appreciative of any help they receive. I know the money loaned will be used wisely, and provides an opportunity to make positive impacts economically for their family, community, & country.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the Safety and Occupational Health Director for a U.S. Agency that conducts  research and development on infectious diseases.  Olya recently immigrated to  the United States and is pursuing her American Dream.

lenders.name: Mandi
lenders.loan_because: It's an effective way to help people. Better than just throwing money at them.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm going to school to be a Social Worker.

lenders.name: Larry Swanson
lenders.loan_because: Jesus Christ cared about me and I care about people in his name.

lenders.name: Janice
lenders.loan_because: It's a wonderful feeling to know I can help people in many parts of the world through this wonderful organization.  I can't imagine anyone hearing about Kiva and not immediately joining the crusade to make the world better for us ALL.

lenders.name: Chad
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a graduate student. I'm training to become a psychologist.

lenders.name: Kaye
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the Chinese proverb "Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime" and I think it's a wonderful opportunity to support people who are trying to improve their lives and the lives of their families.

lenders.name: Mike and Tasha
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we believe deeply in helping others.

lenders.name: Yoko
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is the way to fight with poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is to research and publish the voice of women in Tanzania. I will continue on researching mothers and babies in developing countries.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurs.

lenders.name: Liezl Buenaventura
lenders.loan_because: wealth should be shared, not hoarded.
lenders.occupational_info: www.familyko.com

lenders.name: MImi
lenders.loan_because: Consideration for others is like investing in pennies and getting dollars back.
lenders.occupational_info: The learning never stops - for the teacher and student.

lenders.name: A & F
lenders.loan_because: Together, we can make a better world!

lenders.name: Kazue
lenders.loan_because: I had been working with something securities market related which is frenzied, seems to be somewhat spun off from actual life's economy. I wanted to recontribute money into meaningful, tangible and  something I want to commit.

lenders.name: Casino
lenders.occupational_info: Play all kinds of casino games for free!

lenders.name: Evan
lenders.occupational_info: I am a professional programmer who is bound to my bed with a laptop from 2001.   I can code in PHP, C++, Javascript, Ajax, MySQL pretty much anything i read, i can understand.

lenders.name: JIH
lenders.loan_because:
I've read a lot of stuff about how the way in which we (the West) have traditionally given foreign aid has not always worked out.  So, I thought I'd contribute to something constructive.

This microloan stuff is a great alternative.  It helps people out to do their own thing.  As opposed to us telling them what to do!
lenders.occupational_info: Student , community welfare worker  volunteer, idiot sports fan (football, NFL, Ice Hockey)

lenders.name: Rishi Tiwari
lenders.loan_because: i like to help honest hard working people who choose to work for their betterment despite their limited resources.
lenders.occupational_info: It is a job where you come across huge amount of money everyday but which does not belongs to you. You are a custodian of it and honesty and hard work has to be your nature.

lenders.name: Daniella
lenders.loan_because: I love people.

lenders.name: A small paw
lenders.loan_because: I have a comfy life and think the world needs as much balance as it can get, I know microfinance won't solve world poverty but if I can make a small paw of difference that's great!
lenders.occupational_info: I'd rather be travelling the world...

lenders.name: Ginu
lenders.loan_because: I was helped by good people. I help others in need in return.

lenders.name: Ewoud
lenders.loan_because: It works.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: The world is too small of a place to ignore your neighbor.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student and I am in the US military.  I want to transform our military from the inside out with a different perspective on the world.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: Opportunity is the beginning of achievment
lenders.occupational_info: I serve teenagers in a high school library.

lenders.name: Jeffrey
lenders.loan_because: I care about the World and to give hope to underprivileged people who are trying to improve their situation while improving the economies in their local communities.

lenders.name: Rohan
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed with good fortune and believe it is important for all of us to share our wealth with each other.

lenders.name: Shirley
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed--and this is a way that I can make a small difference for someone else.

lenders.name: abadrivera
lenders.loan_because: i believe in investing in people and their potential to be successful in their own way.
lenders.occupational_info: i want to make design and architecture truly relevant in our society. one of the ways we can do that is by taking on projects that can positively impact people and their communities. my current project focuses on researching the lahar-ravaged town of Bacolor, Pampanga in the Philippines and developing a series of architectural design strategies to assist in its full recovery and preservation of its architectural legacy. in doing so, i am hoping to also help preserve the communities and their collective memories.

lenders.name: Simon
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people.

staf goverment with less salary and i'm try to learn internet bussines, so far is to dificult find god site... to much scam.
So I thing ... internet is the god way who can make bussines online, and I try..

lenders.name: jose
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel good i like helping others and know that i can make a diffrence in the world
lenders.occupational_info: well what i do is fly airplanes with a teacher (instructor) and he teaches me how to fly the airplane but not for nothing it goes by licenses there is three main licenses a private a intrument and a commercial licenses im working on the second licenses my intrument im short of being done i hope

lenders.name: Heidi Jury
lenders.occupation: Musician and Works at a Charity
lenders.loan_because: I believe that using business to save the world rather than destroy it makes sense intellectually and spiritually
lenders.occupational_info: My work as a musician is to bring together communities.  Working at a charity that helps children across the world helps me to bring together the world.  www.chalice.ca

lenders.name: Houssein
lenders.loan_because:
My first reason for loaning is that I wanted to do it on behalf of my wife and my 2 daughters. My second reason is that, as a head of household, it is my duty to help when I can and wherever I can.
My third reason is that I am Lebanese and I was born in Senegal where the Djiito family is from. May God bless all of you, helpers and receivers.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a Pharmacy Hospital. My shift is a 10 hour day four times a week. I supervise the work flow and the work of 2 to 3 pharmacy technicians. I also make sure that disease /medication treatment is appropriate and that all medications doses and frequencies are correct all throughout my shift. I mix antibiotics and Chemo therapy agents for all appropriate patients. I also assist the nurses and the physicians in some ambiguities that may occur during their shift to facilitate their demandes that are directly connected to the Pharmacy and their patients. I also fill prescriptions for free for home use to the indigen families that cannot afford to pay. And many more.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: I have a little to share.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of sick people in a hospital.

lenders.name: Ines
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do - it makes me feel good. There are a lot of people who weren't as lucky and I want to help them. Plus, I'm human - that's what we're supposed to do.

lenders.name: Joseph
lenders.loan_because: Need to purchase office equipement like a computer and printer, table , phone and chair. I also need a USED van for supply distribution.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a GENERAL CONTRACTOR, who supplies office products, construction, maintenance projects and professional services to the Government and the private sector.
